quote: 'An athlete cannot run with money in his pockets. He must run with hope in his heart and dreams in his head.'
author: Emil Zatopek

quote: 'I’d rather regret the risks that didn’t work out than the chances I didn’t take at all.'
author: Simone Biles

quote: 'Only the disciplined ones in life are free. If you are undisciplined
author: you are a slave to your moods and your passions.'
